metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23959 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An XSS bug in internal error pages could have led to various spoofing attacks, including other error pages and the address bar. Note: This issue only affected Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 85.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine avital> Android only

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
